properties.areaDesc: Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway; Haines Borough and Lynn Canal
properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 27 at 4:35AM AKST until January 29 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 24
inches possible. Wind gust could as high as 50 mph when they
switch to the south through Wednesday near sea level.


* WHERE...Skagway area including the Klondike Highway and the
Haines area including the Haines Highway. Highest snow amounts
near the Haines border and near White Pass.

* WHEN...From Tuesday evening through Wednesday afternoon. Areas
near sea level may change over to rain through Wednesday
morning.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible from
hazardous conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly
reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
properties.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON FOR AREAS AROUND HAINES AND SKAGWAY
